Welcome

My name is Callum Apps and I'm a Computer
Science Student based in Reading, UK. You can
find more about me, my work and my
interests on GitHub or LinkedIn.

I'm a passionate Third-Year Computer Science student
enrolled at the University of Reading.
My journey in this dynamic field has equipped me with a diverse skill set that includes
proficiency in several programming languages such as Java, C, Python, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS.
For a comprehensive overview of my academic background, skills, and experiences,
please explore my About Me Page.
